A backdrop appears behind all other surfaces in an app, displaying contextual and actionable content. Alert dialogs interrupt users with urgent information, details, or actions. Bottom navigation bars allow movement between primary destinations in an app."\n""\n"A bottom app bar displays navigation and key actions at the bottom of mobile screens. Bottom sheets are surfaces containing supplementary content that are anchored to the bottom of the screen. Buttons allow users to take actions, and make choices, with a single tap. Lists are continuous, vertical indexes of text or images. Notifications provide short, timely, and relevant information about your app when itâ€™s not in use. Tabs organize content across different screens, data sets, and other interactions. The top app bar displays information and actions relating to the current screen. You need data to download freebies. So we request you to turn on the data and try again. CodeX is a design app - backed by source code that helps teams build best user interface experiences. Navigation drawers provide access to destinations and app functionality, such as switching accounts. They can either be permanently on-screen or controlled by a navigation menu icon. Side sheets are surfaces containing supplementary content that are anchored to the left or right edge of the screen. Dialog informs users about a task and can contain critical information, require decisions, or involve multiple tasks. Help & Feedback - Added more categories."\n"- Fixed Oreo update issues."\n"- Changes in UI."\n"- Increase in number of freebies."\n"- Fixed Android Pie update issues. Rating of 4 out of 5 in CodeCanyon."\n"[Version 1.6] Get 50% OFF up to You just crossed one more level!! Share this with your friends and win a chance of getting one more star.
Removal of Ads. Added new categories and updated existing categories. Much cleaner design along with dark theme. Removal of freebies section. Bug fixes and performance improvements. Update color is green for this version. Deprecation warnings have been removed. No permissions requested. . . . . . . 1 2 3 4 XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX Main2Activity
